meanings: (책임을) blame (sb/sth for sth), bring[call, hold] sb to account
(피·잉크·흙 등이) be stained with, be smeared with

vlive.korean: [재밌는 일은 스태프분에게 묻는 너누 귀여움이 제일 재밌어] 없었나? [Asking about his day to staff members] [That's so cute] Nothing? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SEVENTEEN] 귀여운 저너누 보따리에 쏙 넣어버려🐱❣️ (HAPPY WONWOO DAY!)
vlive.english: [Asking about his day to staff members] [That's so cute] Nothing?

vlive.korean: 아론 형 타투가 너무 좋아서 자꾸 묻는 거라고요? You are asking because you like ARON's tattoo? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 러브들♥️
vlive.english: You are asking because you like ARON's tattoo?

vlive.korean: 으아닛 로디! RGRG는 영어잖아! 하고 묻는 유행어 알못인 당신! You might say, "LODI! RGRG is an English word!". You're wrong! 듣기 View video V CREW : [V CREW] 로디 알쓸덕잡 EP. 01 RGRG👌
vlive.english: You might say, "LODI! RGRG is an English word!". You're wrong!

vlive.korean: [상민에게 한 질문을 다빈에게 다시 묻는 민석] 너무 좋았다? [The same question being asked] So good? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나를 좋아해주는 사람에게 마음이 움직일까? #고백하기_좋은_순간ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP11
vlive.english: [The same question being asked] So good?

vlive.korean: 일단 뭐가 묻는 거구나? - 응 난 좀 무서워 - 해볼까요? It smears your hand. - I am scared. - Shall we? 듣기 View video OSEN : ITZY 유나, 사랑스러운 막내 '신나유' #스타로드 하이라이트
vlive.english: It smears your hand. - I am scared. - Shall we?

examples.korean: ‘Why do you ask?’ ‘Oh, just idle curiosity’. 발음듣기 “왜 묻는 거니?” “어, 그냥 단순한 호기심에서지 뭐.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Why do you ask?’ ‘Oh, just idle curiosity’. 발음

examples.korean: It would be impracticable for each member to be consulted on every occasion. 발음듣기 매번 모든 구성원들의 의견을 묻는 것은 거의 실행 불가능할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It would be impracticable for each member to be consulted on every occasion. 발음

examples.korean: Hey, I know you’re a foodie, so I was wondering if you could give me any recommendations for a good sushi restaurant. 발음듣기 야, 네가 미식가인 거 알아서 묻는 건데, 좋은 스시 식당 추천해줄 수 있을까 해서. DARAKWON
examples.english: Hey, I know you’re a foodie, so I was wondering if you could give me any recommendations for a good sushi restaurant. 발음

examples.korean: A new law banning companies from asking jobseekers for unnecessary personal information came into force Wednesday. 발음듣기 기업들이 구직자들에게 불필요한 개인정보를 묻는 것을 금지하는 새로운 법이 수요일부터 시행됐다. The Korea Times
examples.english: A new law banning companies from asking jobseekers for unnecessary personal information came into force Wednesday. 발음

examples.korean: Are you deaf? Why don't you answer my question? 발음듣기 귀가 먹었니? 왜 묻는 데 대답을 안 해! 생활 표현 사전
examples.english: Are you deaf? Why don't you answer my question? 발음
